amendment.description: An amendment numbered 24 printed in House Report 119-232 to prohibit funding for the Delaware River Basin Commission.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 285 (Roll no. 228).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 143 - 285 (Roll no. 228).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
